subject: Operation of Toll Plaza
text: HRdq 774t4 <THT 4faarvt {44 Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (1ev wda7t *< roTAT #Nq4) 47 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QR: /Extn:: 2223_ 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i1-5 & 6; 07e<-10, ETrFT, #f faovfft- 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/T-24/03-04/CMD-CO/Comparison (Fee Collection) 23.09.2010. COMMERCIAL QPERATION CRCULAR 125 All efforts are done to ensure that the open competitive bids for Toll Plazas are finalized at the earliest;  Departmental collection on Toll Plazas by Project Directors will continue till successful bidders takes over. Strict vigilance and watch needs to be kept o departmental collection so that revenue does not go down. It is observed from the monthly collection reports that revenue collection is on the decline at some of the toll plazas including those directly managed by the Project Directors departmentally. It reflects that Project Directors are not giving due importance to the revenue collection work: It is therefore; enjoined upon all concerned Project Directors and Regional Officers to keep strict vigil and watch on toll collection so that revenue does not go down: Further all concerned Project Directors are hereby directed to communicate daily toll collection figures to Head Office through Regional Office for further analysis comparison. Regional Officers are also requested to give priority to review the revenue collection work. ~w (Abdul Ali) . General Manager (CO) To, 1.AII ROs 2. All PIUs/CMUs HT {t ?
